titleStmt.title: The new disease, or, A rational account of the great colds and couhgs [sic] now raging amongst us shewing the true causes of the said distempers, and approved remedies for their speedy cure : together with the author's solemn invitation to all that shall escape those maladies, to come and dine with him Christmas next / by J.L. student in physick and astrology.
titleStmt.author: J. L.
